title: CalEnviroScreen 5.0 (Draft)
description: Draft CalEnviroScreen 5.0 (released January 2026) is a cumulative environmental pollution and health vulnerability screening tool developed by California's Office of Environmental Health Hazard Assessment (OEHHA). It scores all 9,106 California census tracts (2020 geography) by combining 12 Pollution Burden indicators (exposure and environmental effects) with 9 Population Characteristics indicators (sensitive populations and socioeconomic factors). The CES Score = Pollution Burden Score × Population Characteristics Score. Version 5.0 adds two new indicators (Children's Lead Risk from Housing and Small Air Toxic Sites) and updates all existing indicators.

links.title: California Open Data Portal — Draft CalEnviroScreen 5.0

providers.name: California Office of Environmental Health Hazard Assessment (OEHHA)

parquet.title: GeoParquet — CalEnviroScreen 5.0
parquet.description: Census tract polygons (EPSG:4326) with all CES 5.0 indicators, scores, and demographic data

pmtiles.title: PMTiles — CalEnviroScreen 5.0
pmtiles.description: Vector tiles for web map visualization of CalEnviroScreen 5.0 results.

h3_parquet.title: H3 Hex Parquet — CalEnviroScreen 5.0
h3_parquet.description: H3 hexagon resolution 10 with parent resolutions 9, 8, 0 partitioned by h0 cell

table:columns.name: _cng_fid
table:columns.description: Synthetic feature ID added during processing

table:columns.name: tract
table:columns.description: Census Tract ID from 2020 Decennial Census

table:columns.name: AppoxLoc
table:columns.description: Approximate city or unincorporated area (reference only)

table:columns.name: CIscore
table:columns.description: Draft CES 5.0 Score (Pollution Burden Score × Population Characteristics Score)

table:columns.name: AirOzone
table:columns.description: Mean summer daily max 8-hour ozone concentration

table:columns.name: ChildLead
table:columns.description: Potential risk for lead exposure in children in low-income communities with older housing (new in v5.0)

table:columns.name: ChildLead_Pctl
table:columns.description: Children's Lead Risk from Housing percentile

table:columns.name: DieselPM
table:columns.description: Diesel PM emissions from on-road and non-road sources near populated blocks

table:columns.name: DrinkingWater
table:columns.description: Drinking water contaminant index for selected contaminants

table:columns.name: Pesticides
table:columns.description: Total pounds of selected active pesticide ingredients per square mile

table:columns.name: ToxReleases
table:columns.description: Toxicity-weighted air concentrations from chemical releases by large facilities

table:columns.name: TrafficImp
table:columns.description: Traffic density in vehicle-km/hr per road length within 150m of census tract boundary

table:columns.name: CleanupSites
table:columns.description: Sum of weighted EnviroStor and NPL Superfund sites within buffered distances

table:columns.name: gwthreats
table:columns.description: Sum of weighted GeoTracker cleanup, UST, produced water pond, dairy/feedlot sites

table:columns.name: HazWaste
table:columns.description: Sum of weighted hazardous waste facilities and large quantity generators

table:columns.name: ImpWaters
table:columns.description: Sum of pollutants across impaired water bodies within buffered distances

table:columns.name: SmAirToxSites
table:columns.description: Sum of CEIDARS emissions sites and oil/gas well sites within buffered distances (new in v5.0)

table:columns.name: SolidWaste
table:columns.description: Sum of weighted solid waste sites (SWIS) within buffered distances

table:columns.name: Pollution
table:columns.description: Average of Pollution Burden percentiles (Environmental Effects weighted 0.5×)

table:columns.name: PollutionScore
table:columns.description: Pollution Burden scaled 0–10 (used to calculate CES Score)

table:columns.name: asthma
table:columns.description: Age-adjusted rate of ED visits for asthma

table:columns.name: Cardiovascular
table:columns.description: Age-adjusted rate of ED visits for heart attacks per 10,000

table:columns.name: DiabetesPrev
table:columns.description: Model-based prevalence of diabetes in adults ≥18

table:columns.name: LowBirthWeight
table:columns.description: Percent of infants weighing less than 2,500g

table:columns.name: Education
table:columns.description: % of population over 25 with less than high school education

table:columns.name: HousingBurden
table:columns.description: % of households that are low-income AND severely burdened by housing costs

table:columns.name: LinguisticIso
table:columns.description: % of households where no one over age 14 speaks English well

table:columns.name: Poverty
table:columns.description: % of people living below twice the federal poverty level

table:columns.name: Unemployment
table:columns.description: % of people aged 16+ who are unemployed and in the workforce

table:columns.name: PopCharScore
table:columns.description: Population Characteristics scaled 0–10 (used to calculate CES Score)

table:columns.name: PopUnd_10
table:columns.description: % of population under 10 years old (2023 5-year ACS)
